description:
[b]Play with everything from Raft Mechanic, but in creative!(no sharks though)[/b]
[b]Thanks to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2816900681]Questionable Mark's Modded Craftbot Recipes[/url], they're also craftable in survival![/b]

[b]Custom loot in survival available via the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3224128169]Custom Loot[/url] mod[/b]

More info about the mod [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2807590049]here[/url]!

Please leave all suggestions and ideas for Raft Mechanic on the custom game(linked above) instead of this mod.
name: Raft Mechanic: Tools & Parts For Creative
